title: UserInfoResponse
description: The struct describes a response used to return a staker's vAMP lock position.

current_power.description: Current voting power at the current

lock_end.description: Timestamp when the user's lock expires

slope.description: The slope at which the user's voting power decays

vote_ts.description: Last timestamp when the user voted

votes.description: The vote distribution for all the validators the staker picked
